name: Fruity Mini Pancake Skewers
author: lutzflcat
summary: This is perfect finger food, and the kids will love these eye-catching, mini pancake skewers. Great for breakfast or brunch, but equally good as a snack or even a game-day buffet.
ingredients: 1/4 cup blueberry cream cheese spread (such as Philadelphia®)
1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar, or to taste
directions: Whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt in a bowl
Whisk milk, egg, butter, and amaretto extract together in a second bowl
Pour wet ingredients into the flour mixture, and mix until batter is well combined and smooth
Heat a large nonstick skillet or griddle over medium heat
Drop teaspoonfuls of batter onto the hot skillet to form 1-inch diameter pancakes
Cook for about 1 to 2 minutes, flip, and continue cooking until golden brown, about 1 more minute
Transfer cooked pancakes to a plate and repeat with remaining batter
Stack ingredients on a work surface as follows: pancake, banana, pancake spread with cream cheese, pancake, strawberry, and pancake
) Insert a skewer through the center of the stack and repeat to make remaining skewers
Dust with confectioners sugar, and serve
